header: <html>  <head>    <style>      .main {        font-family: Helvetica,  Arial, sans-serif;        font-size: 10px;        border-spacing: 0;        border-collapse: collapse;      }      .main td{        padding: 11px;        background-color: #f8f8ff;        border-right: 2px solid white;      }      .main td:nth-child(even) {        width: 50px;      }      .main th {          padding: 11px;   width: 150px;   }      .main tr {          border-bottom: 2px solid white;      }      .main th:nth-child(even){          background-color:#b0c4de;          padding-right: 0px;          width:50px;      } .logo {    width: 250px; }     .main td:nth-child(odd) {      }  .date-range{    margin-top: -30px; margin-left: 30px;}   .main th:nth-child(odd){          background-color: gray;          border-right: 2px solid white;      }      .main th:first-child{        background-color: white;        width:40px;      }      .main th:last-child{        width: 150px;      }             .header{        display: flex;        justify-content: space-between;        margin-bottom: 10px;        font-size: 11px;      }      .header h1{        margin-bottom: 3px;      }       .header h3{        margin-bottom: 10px;        margin-top: 0px;      }      .imagedive {        display: flex;        flex-direction: column;        justify-content: flex-end;      }      .container{        margin: 0 auto;        font-family: Helvetica,  Arial, sans-serif;      }      .footer{        font-size: 12px !important;        color:#808080;        border-top: 3px solid #808080;        text-align: center;      }      .meal{        display: flex;        margin-bottom: 5px;      }      .meal-date{          width: 50px;          flex-shrink: 0;      }      .meal-info{        display: flex;        margin-left: 10px;        flex-direction: column;     }     </style>  </head>  <body>    <div class='container'>
